mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM gd_order_cancel a LEFT JOIN gd_order_item b ON a.sno=b.cancel , gd_order c LEFT JOIN gd_member d ON d.m_no = c.m_no WHERE b.ordno=c.ordno AND istep>40 AND b.cyn='y' AND b.dyn in('n','r') ORDER BY a.sno desc

select a.sno as oCsno ,a.ordno as oCordno ,a.name as oCname ,a.regdt as oCregdt ,a.ccdt as oCccdt ,a.bankcode as oCbankcode ,a.bankaccount as oCbankaccount ,a.bankuser as oCbankuser ,b.sno as oIsno ,b.ordno as oIordno ,b.goodsno as oIgoodsno ,b.goodsnm as oIgoodsnm ,b.goodsnmKR as oIgoodsnmKR ,b.goodsnmCN as oIgoodsnmCN ,b.addopt as oIaddopt ,b.price as oIprice ,b.coupon as oIcoupon ,b.memberdc as oImemberdc ,b.ea as oIea ,b.reserve as oIreserve ,c.ordno as oRordno ,c.nameOrder as oRnameorder ,c.settlekind as oRsettlekind ,c.settleprice as oRsettleprice ,c.prn_settleprice as oRpmsettleprice ,c.goodsprice as oRgoodsprice ,c.delivery as oRdelivery ,c.coupon as oRcoupon ,c.emoney as oRemoney ,c.memberdc as oRmemberdc ,c.adddelivery as oRaddDelivery ,c.orddt as oRorddt ,d.m_no as mBm_no ,d.m_id as mBmid ,CONCAT(T1.opt1 ,' ', T1.opt2) AS optname from gd_order_cancel a left join gd_order_item b on a.sno=b.cancel left join gd_goods_option T1 ON b.opt1=T1.sno, gd_order c left join gd_member d on c.m_no=d.m_no where b.ordno=c.ordno AND istep>40 AND b.cyn='y' AND b.dyn in('n','r') order by a.sno desc limit #{rowStart}, #{pageSize}
mapper.update: update gd_order_cancel set rprice = ${rprice}, rfee = ${rfee}, remoney = ${remoney}, ccdt = now(), bankcode = ${bankcode}, bankaccount = ${bankaccount}, bankuser = #{bankuser} where sno=${sno}
update gd_order_item set istep=74, cyn='r' where cancel=${sno}
mapper.select: select ordno from gd_order_cancel where sno=${sno}
mapper.update: update gd_order set cyn='r' ,step2=74 where ordno=${ordno} and step2 in (41, 42, 62, 72)
mapper.select: select b.*, a.*, (select category from gd_goods_link where gd_goods_link.goodsno = a.goodsno order by rand() limit 1) as category from gd_order_item a left join gd_goods b on a.goodsno=b.goodsno where ordno = ${ordno}
SELECT T2.applysno FROM gd_coupon_apply T1 JOIN gd_coupon_applymember T2 ON T1.sno = T2.applysno JOIN gd_coupon T3 ON T1.couponcd = T3.couponcd WHERE T2.ordno = #{ordno} AND T3.goodstype = 0
SELECT T3.applysno FROM gd_coupon_apply T1 JOIN gd_coupon_goodsno T2 ON T1.couponcd=T2.couponcd JOIN gd_coupon_applymember T3 ON T1.sno=T3.applysno WHERE T3.ordno=#{ordno} AND T2.goodsno=#{goodsno}
